tag_list: lan-messenger, office-messenger, lan-transfer, instant-messenger, intranet-messenger, im-server, net-send
overview: BigAntSoft provides instant messaging solution for secure business communication. Products including instant messenger, live chat, document management. BigAnt Office Messenger is a corporate instant messaging solution for office. Features including instant messaging, offline messaging, group discussion, file exchange, Active Directory integration, Centralized stores history message and file transfer archives, support multiple platform including Windows, Mac and Blackberry.
